template_info.name: Dark-Type Shadows
template_info.description: A sinister team focused on status effects, critical hits, and disrupting opponent strategies
template_info.usage_notes: Dark types excel at disruption and critical hits. Focus on status moves and high critical hit ratio attacks to control the battle.

pokemon.name: umbreon
pokemon.strategy: Extremely bulky dark type with status spreading
pokemon.tips: Toxic + Moonlight creates a powerful stall combination

pokemon.name: crobat
pokemon.strategy: Fast flying type with dark coverage and utility
pokemon.tips: Haze resets all stat changes - great against setup teams

pokemon.name: houndoom
pokemon.strategy: Fire/dark type with special attack setup
pokemon.tips: Nasty Plot doubles special attack for powerful sweeps

pokemon.name: sneasel
pokemon.strategy: Fast physical attacker with high critical hit moves
pokemon.tips: Slash and Shadow Claw have high critical hit ratios

pokemon.name: murkrow
pokemon.tips: Pursuit punishes switching while Thunder Wave controls speed

pokemon.name: sableye
pokemon.strategy: Ghost/dark type with no weaknesses and status support
pokemon.tips: No weaknesses make it safe to switch in and spread status
